name: Rollerrat Helmets

items.alias: B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid
Undamaged Piece of Rubbery Rollerrat Flesh

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "screwdriver" "150922" or #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor)" "162218" (#L "recipe" "/tell recipe 30") #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" #L "B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid" "162247" #L "Undamaged Piece of Rubbery Rollerrat Flesh" "206886" #L "MasterComm - Personalization Device" "156025" #L "Ancarim Sun Tan Lotion" "205874" #L "Carbonum Plate Helmet" "162437" (#L "recipe" "/tell recipe 30") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid + Undamaged Piece of Rubbery Rollerrat Flesh = #L "Tanned Piece of Rollerrat Flesh" "206890" Skills: | AG,CH | ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + MasterComm - Personalization Device = #L "Communication Device" "206891" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Communication Device + Tanned Piece of Rollerrat Flesh = #L "Fragile Rollerrat Helmet" "206892" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Ancarim Sun Tan Lotion + Fragile Rollerrat Helmet = #L "Simple Rollerrat Helmet" "206876" Skills: | BE | You can use 9 another Tanned Piece of Rollerrat Flesh on your Simple Rollerrat Helmet, then you get ... #L "Excellent Rollerrat Helmet" "206885" ------------------------------ Screwdriver + Excellent Rollerrat Helmet = #L "Disassembled Rollerrat Helmet" "206898" Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Disassembled Rollerrat Helmet + Carbonum Plate Helmet = #L "Rollerrat Carbonum Helmet" "206897" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ A very very very very strange looking hat :D
